original_text: They built the foundation of the Lord's temple in the fourth year that Solomon was king. It was in the month called Ziv.
korean_text: 넷째 해 시브월에 여호와의 성전 기초를 쌓았고

sentences.original_text: They built the foundation of the Lord's temple
in the fourth year that Solomon was king
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 왕이 된 지 사 년째 되는 해에

sentences.original_text: It was in the month called Ziv
